Huntington_Park.Park Fifth Towers: Park Fifth was a planned $1 billion double tower luxury residential high-rise condominium complex overlooking Pershing Square in Los Angeles. The skyscrapers were to be part of the revitalization boom in Downtown Los Angeles. Park Fifth 1 would have been a 732 residential unit tower, making it the taller of the two towers, and the tallest residential tower west of Chicago, at 76 stories and 250 m (820 ft).
